lead_paragraph: DONN--Anthony. Columbia University Medical Center mourns the passing of Anthony Donn, M.D., former Chairman of our Department of Ophthalmology, leading academic ophthalmologist, scientist, and gifted surgeon. A graduate of our College of Physicians & Surgeons, Dr. Donn was a member of the Columbia faculty for 35 years, rising to the rank of Professor and, in 1989, to Chairman, a position he held until his retirement in 1995. We offer condolences to the extended Donn family. George Cioffi, M.D., Chairman Stanley Chang, M.D., Chairman Emeritus Department of Ophthalmology, Columbia University Medical Center 1/3
